nodes.text: Topside Infiltration is a Star Wars Roleplaying Game Adventure published in Star Wars Gamer 8. It was written by Peter M. Schweighofer and illustrated by Carl Critchlow.
A group of spacers must infiltrate Gallo Memm's estate on Vaynai.
They must sneak past the guards and rob Memm's vault.
The adventure is relatively open-ended in terms of background and progression.
